body_html: Every compute capability you compile for increases the size of the binary significantly, so it is unlikely that we'll support every compute capability Nvidia has ever produced in the default binaries. But everything >= 3.0 should work if build from sources, although we only test for a small subset.
body_text: Every compute capability you compile for increases the size of the binary significantly, so it is unlikely that we'll support every compute capability Nvidia has ever produced in the default binaries.  But everything >= 3.0 should work if build from sources, although we only test for a small subset.
